org.spongepowered.api.text.message

Interface MessageBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageBuilder.Score, MessageBuilder.Selector, MessageBuilder.Text, MessageBuilder.Translatable

    public interface MessageBuilder
    Represents a builder interface to create immutable Message instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MessageBuilder.Score
      Represents a MessageBuilder creating immutable Message.Score instances.
      static interface  MessageBuilder.Selector
      Represents a MessageBuilder creating immutable Message.Selector instances.
      static interface  MessageBuilder.Text
      Represents a MessageBuilder creating immutable Message.Text instances.
      static interface  MessageBuilder.Translatable
      Represents a MessageBuilder creating immutable Message.Translatable instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBuilder append(java.lang.Iterable<Message> children)
      Appends the specified Messages to the end of this message.
      MessageBuilder append(Message... children)
      Appends the specified Messages to the end of this message.
      Message build()
      Builds an immutable instance of the current state of this message builder.
      MessageBuilder color(TextColor color)
      Sets the TextColor of this message.
      MessageBuilder onClick(ClickAction<?> action)
      Sets the ClickAction that will be executed if this message is clicked in the chat.
      MessageBuilder onHover(HoverAction<?> action)
      Sets the HoverAction that will be executed if this message is hovered in the chat.
      MessageBuilder onShiftClick(ShiftClickAction<?> action)
      Sets the ShiftClickAction that will be executed if this message is shift-clicked in the chat.
      MessageBuilder style(TextStyle... styles)
      Sets the text styles of this message.

      • style

        MessageBuilder style(TextStyle... styles)
        Sets the text styles of this message. This will construct a composite TextStyle of the current style and the specified styles first and set it to the message.
        Parameters:
        styles - The text styles to apply
        Returns:
        This message builder

      • build

        Message build()
        Builds an immutable instance of the current state of this message builder.
        Returns:
